message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident you'll see the benefit in this deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I think the product is worth less to me. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,400,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price.  Let's meet in the middle.  I'll accept $1,600,000. This allows both of us to gain from this transaction.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not willing to pay $1,600,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll offer $1,500,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
